text: Vals is a municipality of the district Surselva in the canton of Graub√ºnden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2015, the former municipality of St. Martin merged into the municipality of Vals. It is known for its mineral water brand Valser. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Therme Vals * Archipreneur's Journey to Vals Category:Municipalities in Surselva Category:Ski areas and resorts in Switzerland Category:Spa towns in Switzerland
